text: The 2009–10 CERH European League was the 45th edition of the CERH European League organized by CERH. Its Final Six was held in May 2010 at PalaLido in Valdagno, Italy. ==Group stage== In each group, teams played against each other home-and-away in a home-and-away round-robin format. The group winners advanced directly to the Final Six while the runners-up advanced to a qualifying play-off. ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ===Group C=== ===Group D=== ==Qualifying play-off== The two winners of this play-off would join the Final Six competition with the four group winners. |} ==Final Six== The 2010 European League Final Six was held in May 2010 in Valdagno, Italy. ===Group stage=== ====Group E==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width="175"|Team !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| |- bgcolor="#bbf3bb" |align=left| Barcelona |2||1||1||0||15||7||+8||4 |- |align=left| Porto |2||1||1||0||8||6||+2||4 |- |align=left| Valdagno |2||0||0||2||5||15||||0 |} \---- \---- ====Group F==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width="175"|Team !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| !width="20"| |- bgcolor="#bbf3bb" |align=left| Vic |2||1||1||0||9||8||+1||4 |- |align=left| Reus Deportiu |2||1||0||1||9||7||+2||3 |- |align=left| Noia |2||0||1||1||8||11||–3||1 |} \---- \---- ===Final=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto; width: 20%" |-European League 2009–10 Winners |- | |- |FC Barcelona 19th Title |} ==External links== * * CERH website * Final 6--Official Website * Italian web site with Live Scores ===International=== * Roller Hockey links worldwide * Mundook-World Roller Hockey * Hardballhock-World Roller Hockey * Inforoller World Roller Hockey * World Roller Hockey Blog * rink-hockey-news - World Roller Hockey Category:International roller hockey competitions hosted by Italy Category:2009 in roller hockey Category:2010 in roller hockey Category:2010 in Italian sport Category:Rink Hockey Euroleague
